Literature.Title: Combating Drug-Resistant Fungi with Novel Imperfectly Amphipathic Palindromic Peptides.
Literature.Author: Wang J, Chou S, Yang Z, Yang Y, Wang Z, Song J, Dou X, Shan A

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:10% hemolysis=>128 µM,Human embryonic kidney HEK293T cells:5% Killing=64 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MBC=8µM),Escherichia coli 1005(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli 1005(MBC=16µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=4µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MBC=8µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum ATCC 7913(MIC=32µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Pullorum ATCC 7913(MBC=64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MBC=32µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MBC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MBC=8µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MBC=8µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=16µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MFC=32µM),Candida albicans(MIC=4-32µM),Candida albicans(MFC=8-32µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MIC=4µM),Candida tropicalis CGMCC 2.1975(MFC=8µM),Candida krusei CGMCC 2.1857(MIC=4µM),Candida krusei CGMCC 2.1857(MFC=4µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MIC=>64µM),Candida parapsilosis CGMCC 2.3989(MFC=>64µM),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=8µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=32µM),Candida albicans CGMCC 2.2086(MIC=16µM),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(0-10% Killing=64µM)
